item.description:
This is opening weekend for Captain America.

I picked the 6PM, 2D, showtime because I wasn't sure if everyone would want to see the 3D (4:40PM) version.

Buy your ticket, then meet by the pinball machine in the theater's arcade at 5:30. We will wait till 5:45-5:50 to go in.

Post comments, if in the future you would rather go to a 3D screening.

We can go to Arizona Pizza after the movie. It is right outside the theater lobby, no driving necessary, good pizza and calzones.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the pinball machine in the theater's arcade @5:30
item.name: Captain America, Saturday, 7/23, 5:30 Meetup, 6:05PM movie
